verses.name: Acts 13:5
verses.text: And when they were at Salamis, they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews: and they had also John to their minister.

verses.name: Acts 13:6
verses.text: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos, they found a certain sorcerer, a false prophet, a Jew, whose name was Bar–jesus:

verses.name: Acts 13:7
verses.text: Which was with the deputy of the country, Sergius Paulus, a prudent man; who called for Barnabas and Saul, and desired to hear the word of God.

verses.name: Acts 13:8
verses.text: But Elymas the sorcerer (for so is his name by interpretation) withstood them, seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith.
